document_data.name: ''Ring of the Wise''
document_data.mainbody: '''''Rings of the wise''''' were [[enchanted]] [[ring]]s that fortified the wearer's wisdom.
document_data.Description: ''Rings of the wise'' were simple bands of precious metal with several impeded [[gemstone]]s.
document_data.Powers: The rings possessed a simple enchantment that slightly improved the wearer's sagacity.
document_data.History: A ''ring of the wise'' was worn by a [[goblin]] commander [[Ghotrag]] who participated in the siege of [[Targos]] in [[Mirtul]] of the {{YearlinkName|1312}}.
